name: We're Rooting For You!
description:
Note: On Mac OS, please use Chrome instead of Safari for a better experience

We're Rooting For You!

Get ready to become the ultimate cheerleader in our fast-paced typing game! Type out enthusiastic cheers to give your runner the extra boost they need to secure a top spot on the podium. Experience the thrill of the race as you root your way to victory!
